attributes.action: Keep the bus services running through Rassau and garnlydan, ebbw vale
attributes.additional_details: I have no idea what else to do and need the help to keep the service running for the residents of Rassau and Garnlydan
attributes.background: Stage coach are planning on stopping the X15 bus service through Rassau and Garnlydan and in June/July the fflecsi bus service to Rassau and Garnlydan will also be cancelled, this will leave our residents unable to travel to town, or anywhere.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 

Bus routes are not set by the UK Government. Local bus operators (bus companies) and local authorities are responsible for this.

You could raise the issue with your local council. You can find out who your local councillor is here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
